ARABIC: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or do they say, 'He has simply made it up'? No, the truth is they have no iman.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or do they say: "He has fabricated it?" In fact, they will never believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do they say: “He has himself fabricated the Qur'an?” No; the truth is that they are altogether averse to believing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do they say, "He has falsely invented it (the Quran)?" In fact, they themselves have no faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What! They say, “He has invented the Qur'an”? Rather they do not have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or do they say: "He has forged it" Nay! They believe not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or do they say: He has forged it. Nay! they do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or do they say, 'He has invented it?' Nay, but they do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or say they: He hath invented it? Nay, but they will not believe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Or do they say, "He has invented it himself"? Indeed, they are not willing to believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or say they: he hath fabricated it: aye they will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they say, ‘He has improvised it [himself]?’ Rather, they have no faith!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or do they say, "He fabricated the (Message)"? Nay, they have no faith!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or do they say: "He (Muhammad SAW) has forged it (this Quran)?" Nay! They believe not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do they say: 'He has invented it' No, they do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or do they say, “He made it up”? Rather, they do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:33] Or do they say, ‘He has improvised it?’, he has concocted the Qur’ān. He has not concocted it; Rather they do not believe, out of arrogance. If they [continue to] say that he has concocted it:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or say they) indeed the disbelievers of Mecca say: (He hath invented it?) Muhammad lies and has invented the Qur'an. (Nay, but they will not believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an as in Allah's pre-eternal knowledge! 618
